title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant - "Sowbhagya Mudra"
features: Intricately designed diamond-studded pendant featuring five symmetrical floral motifs. Each motif is pave-set with brilliant-cut diamonds creating a stunning sparkle. The pendant displays a modern take on traditional South Indian design principles, crafted with precision for a refined look. The design incorporates a symmetrical arrangement symbolizing prosperity and harmony.
description: This exquisitely crafted mangalsutra pendant (Tali Bottu) blends modern aesthetics with traditional symbolism. The high-quality diamonds and 18K gold provide lasting brilliance. Makes a perfect gift for the modern South Indian woman who appreciates elegance and tradition.
